forum.name: T6 Optional Activity & Discussion: Report On What You’ve Tried with Your Learners
forum.intro:
If you complete either of the optional hands-on activities listed below:

  • T3 Optional Hands on Activity: Try a New Strategy for Standardized Assessment Success 
  • T4 Optional Activity – Try a Diagnostic or Formative Assessment with Your Learners!

or any other strategy or idea from the course with your learners during this course, please share the activity and results with your course peers via a discussion post below.

After you post, please take time to review others' introductions in the discussion, and post at least one reply in response.

Note: This item will automatically mark itself complete on the main course outline once you have submitted a post.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on the Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
